head.title: More to His Church Than Hispanic Members

hedline.hl1: More to His Church Than Hispanic Members

abstract.p: Parishioner John B Meskers Sr letter opposes May 28 article for focusing on Hispanic membership at St Paul's Roman Catholic Church in Princeton, NJ (S)ï¿½

block.p: As a longtime parishioner of St. Paul's Roman Catholic Church in Princeton, I was pleasantly surprised to see the large photograph of the interior of our church, and a very large article that it accompanied (''The Second Great Wave,'' front page, May 28), which I felt would describe our parish, school, organizations and so on. Yet none of us Caucasian members were mentioned, and neither was the Pastor, Monsignor Walter F. Nolan or the Parochial Vicar Father Michael Santangelo, or the Korean division within our church, with their own priest, Father Simon H. Ahn. To people outside of Princeton you are giving an entirely false picture of the largest Catholic church in this area.
